Uses of Package
com.soa.message

  • Packages that use com.soa.message 
    Package Description
    com.soa.activity  
    com.soa.message
    The message package supplies an abstraction of a message.
    com.soa.message.handler  
    com.soa.message.handler.wsdl  
    com.soa.messenger  
    com.soa.policy.wspolicy

  • Classes in com.soa.message used by com.soa.activity 
    Class and Description
    Exchange
    Properties about the current message exchange.
    Message
    Represents an XML service message with optional properties and attachments.
  • Classes in com.soa.message used by com.soa.message 
    Class and Description
    AbstractExchange
    Abstract implementation of the Exchange interface that can be easily extended for specific implementations.
    AbstractMessage
    Abstract implementation of Message interface that can be easily extended for specific implementations.
    Endpoint
    Represents an endpoint.
    EndpointSelector
    Interface used to select endpoints from a set of candidates.
    Exchange
    Properties about the current message exchange.
    ExternalEndpoint
    Holds information for communicating with an external endpoint.
    Message
    Represents an XML service message with optional properties and attachments.
    MessageAttachments
    This interface represents a collection of attachments, each encapsulated in a MessagePart.
    MessageErrorCode
    Constants for pre-defined message oriented error codes.
    MessagePart
    Multipart messages are represented by a set of MessageParts.
    MessageTransaction
    Represents a transaction executed within the messaging system.
    ParameterType
    Enumeration of message parameter types, input, output, or fault.
    TransactedExchange
    Holds information about a message exchange in a transaction.
